column5: Hi all,  Cant believe i'm working solid over the long weekend....had to watch the boats yesterday morning zoom past the house.....frustration dont even come closeto describe what i was feeling...lol.  Anyway....I just got up from the bottom of the lawn 5 minutes ago after a 20 minute session....MY OPENER.  Pretty darned good actually, got my limit and today's lunch sorted and a nice 32" pike on jig and minnow.   MY OPENER  <object width="425" height="344"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SHS-ru5ptc4?hl=en&fs=1"></param><param'>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SHS-ru5ptc4?hl=en&fs=1"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SHS-ru5ptc4?hl=en&fs=1" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="425" height="344"></embed></object>   NICE SHORE FISHING PIKE        I did manage to get out a week and a bit ago after checking for leaks in the boat.....my buddy Al joined me on a crappie search...alas no crappie.....but the bass started to come up shallow and the pikelets were everywhere.   NO CRAPPIE YET...but theyr'e coming.....  <object width="425" height="344"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8ScZsPyI2IA?hl=en&fs=1"></param><param'>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8ScZsPyI2IA?hl=en&fs=1"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8ScZsPyI2IA?hl=en&fs=1" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="425" height="344"></embed></object>
Love the first video .My your son has grown so much.Nice pike too.
Nice Simon -  need a spot like that for when I retire - for the summer anyway
the first video is priceless!!! thanks for sharing that.
Looks like you got to a great start Simon   Better than mine anyway Got to love back yard fishing Jacques
Great Report. Your sure have a nice place lol. Nothing like fishing in the north let alone living in it.
